plot: A theater director (Sardu) and his assistant (Ralphus) torture naked women on stage. The audience thinks it's &"great special effects&" , but little do they know that it's all real! This sadomasochistic director has plans for these girls that he kidnaps other than using them for his performances. He fulfills his sick fantasies with them.   Written by  Mike Abraham
title: The Incredible Torture Show
